ronSwanson: Standard birth control methods are usually ineffective against a Swanson.
dadJoke: Last night me and my girlfriend watched three DVDs back to back. Luckily I was the one facing the TV.

ronSwanson: Fish, for sport only, not for meat. Fish meat is practically a vegetable.
dadJoke: An apple a day keeps the bullies away. If you throw it hard enough.

ronSwanson: Well, I am not usually one for speeches. So, goodbye.
dadJoke: I'm glad I know sign language, it's pretty handy.
I ate a clock yesterday. It was so time consuming.

ronSwanson: My only official recommendations are US Army-issued mustache trimmers, Morton's Salt, and the C.R. Lawrence Fein two inch axe-style scraper oscillating knife blade.
dadJoke: I gave my friend 10 puns hoping that one of them would make him laugh. Sadly, no pun in ten did.
